name: blog-app
description: Welcome to my first full-stack project! This repository contains the codebase for a blogging application that I built to enhance my skills in web development. I have made this website with the latest technologies & followed the best practices

scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.dev: npm run dev --prefix frontend & npm run dev --prefix backend

author: BinayakShree
